basics.name: Alvin Yang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2020.

work.summary: Assisted in helping students learn about the different engineering disciplines

publications.name: iJam with Channel Randomization
publications.author:
Jordan L Melcher, Yao Zheng, Dylan Anthony, Matthew Troglia,
              Thomas Yang, Alvin Yang, Samson Aggelopoulos, Yanjun Pan, Ming Li
publications.summary:
Implemented a technique to prevent eavesdropping with no prior security association.
    Precodes the bitstream with the channel effect at the receiver.
    Prevents the decoding of the bitstream from attackers with multiple antennas.

publications.name: FaIR: Federated Incumbent Detection in CBRS Band
publications.author: Matthew Troglia, Jordan Melcher, Yao Zheng, Dylan Anthony, Alvin Yang, Thomas Yang
publications.summary:
Spectrum access system, detects incumbent users in the Citizens Broadband Radio Service band.
Use environmental sensors to create a machine learning model to manage spectrum allocation.

awards.title: Outstanding Graduating Senior
awards.awarder: College of Engineering University of Hawaii at Manoa
awards.summary: This bi-annual award honor exceptional undergraduate students in their final term
